top.title: Firefighters search for hundreds still missing in devastating Hong Kong tower blocks fire
top.summary: Dozens of people have died and hundreds remain unaccounted for after Wednesday's blaze.

top.title: Video shows speed fire spreads in Hong Kong tower block
top.summary: Footage geolocated by BBC Verify show the blaze taking hold in Wang Cheong House.

top.title: Putin doubles down on demands for Ukrainian territory ahead of talks with US in Moscow
top.summary: The Russian president accuses Kyiv of wanting to fight "to the last Ukrainian" - which he says Russia is also "in principle" ready to do.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.
